# Ethnicity_Inference_450k

This repository contains all code used to develop the DNAm-based ethnicity classifier on placental 
data [1].

See my other repository, [plmec](https://github.com/wvictor14/plmec), to download the placental 
DNAm-based ethnicity classifier.

## References

[1] Yuan V, Price M, Del Gobbo G, Cox B, Binder AM, Michels KB, Marsit C, Robinson W: Inferring
population structure from placental DNA methylation studies. *In prep.*
